network.protocol

Class ProtocolJSONObjectConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.protocol.ProtocolJSONObjectConverter

  • public class ProtocolJSONObjectConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of functions for converting protocol JSONObjects to other Objects.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann, Yize Sun
